description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
number of experiment from publication
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
name of the participant
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
species of individuals participating in the study - chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
genus of individuals participating in the study – pan/gorilla/pongo
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
variable referring to whether they experienced the tubes or the lines condition
variable referring to the order in which they experienced the conditions within the study
variable referring to on which side of the table the cups were aligned – left / right/ middle
variable referring to the cup which contained the rewards

variable referring to the position of the correct cup based on the relations with which the ape could connect the correct cup on the participant row with the cup baited on the experimenter row - analogy_only / gravity_proximity_analogy / proximity_analogy
variable referring to the apes choice -  left / right/ middle

variable referring to the position of the chosen cup based on the relations with which the ape could connect the correct cup on the participant row with the cup baited on the experimenter row - analogy_only / gravity_proximity_analogy / proximity_analogy
variable referring to whether the participant chose the correct cup (1) or not (0)
